description: Edits an image like blur, resize or adding border and text

properties.name: Blur
properties.description: Adds a blur to the image and so makes it less sharp

properties.name: Border
properties.description: Adds a border to the image

properties.name: Composite
properties.description: Composite image on top of another one

properties.name: Shear
properties.description: Shear image along the X or Y axis

properties.name: Transparent
properties.description: Make a color in image transparent

properties.name: dataPropertyName
properties.description: Name of the binary property in which the image data can be found

properties.name: font
properties.description: The font to use. Defaults to Arial. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: options
properties.description: File name to set in binary data

properties.name: quality
properties.description: Sets the jpeg|png|tiff compression level from 0 to 100 (best)
